{{Dialogue a-b-a|Margaery|Are there any more invitations to send? Or are we finally done with the cursed things?|Mira|One more...an invitation to Ser Maynard.|Ah, yes, one of my father's favorite drinking companions.|[[Margaery Tyrell]] and [[Mira Forrester]]|The Lost Lords}}
Ser '''Maynard''' is a [[knight]] from [[Westeros]]. He is mentioned in ''[[Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series]]''.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Maynard is a good friend of [[Mace Tyrell]]'s, and the two drink together frequently.

==="[[The Lost Lords]]"===
Maynard was invited to the [[Purple Wedding|wedding]] of [[Joffrey Baratheon]] and [[Margaery Tyrell]]. [[Mira Forrester]] writes out his invitation, the last of many.
